name: Mid Day Meal Calculator and Repots(For all States)
description: Mid Day Meal Scheme (MDM) is very good initiative of Government of India Started under Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan in which free meals is being served School-age Children nationwide. Although scheme is so good there is some clerical work which have to be done by teachers. They has to keep records of all daily Spend items, have to take care of stock and lot more. This app will to reduce clerical work of teachers, so that they can Concentrate more on teaching.   Using this app you can calculate, store and generate reports of Mid Day Meal (MDM) Scheme such as  Daily Report  Cooked Menu Report  Stock Inward Report  Used Stock Report  Chef Salary Report
